entry.title: Children in Mental-Health Crisis Surge Into Hospital E.R.s
entry.content: Rising cases and long waits for treatment have desperate families turning to emergency departments for help. “We’re the place of last resort to mop up after the system has failed.”

entry.title: Delays in Acela Upgrade Have Cost Amtrak $140 Million…and Counting
entry.content: The railroad is missing out on revenue while spending millions of dollars to keep older trains in service.

entry.title: Palestinians Flee Northern Gaza as Israel Tightens Siege
entry.content: The United Nations says the exodus of civilians from besieged northern Gaza is accelerating amid concerns about forced displacement.
